GroFile.Name: Header
GroFile.String: TIP4p ice to test that MW is handled correctly

File.Name: -p
File.String:
; ; ; This is a standalone topology file ; ; Created by: ; ; Command line: ; Force field was read from the standard GROMACS share directory. ;
; Include forcefield parameters #include "amber99sb-ildn.ff/forcefield.itp"
; Include water topology #include "amber99sb-ildn.ff/tip4p.itp"
#ifdef POSRES_WATER ; Position restraint for each water oxygen [ position_restraints ] ; i funct fcx fcy fcz 1 1 1000 1000 1000 #endif
; Include topology for ions #include "amber99sb-ildn.ff/ions.itp"
[ system ] ; Name TIP4p ice to test that MW is handled correctly
[ molecules ] ; Compound #mols SOL 2
